pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, October 31, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and his family will participate in Halloween festivities at Rideau Hall.

1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • For more information, please contact the Rideau Hall Press Office at 613-998-9166.
    • Media are asked to arrive via the Visitor Centre gates.
